Evidence.Evidence Artifact Example: Ensure that data (logging and auditing) cannot be changed
Create a policy on who has access to data and under what circumstances
Perform a test to verify that it is possible to track the entire life cycle of an operation/workflow.
Log Management Policy: Document defining what events are logged (Logins, Where the login started, the service that the user logged i, Admin changes) and the retention period (e.g., 7 years).
Audit Log Sample: A raw extract showing structured data: Timestamp, UserID, Source IP, Event Type, and Success/Failure status.
